title: I cant find what skin i recieved from a mystery gift
body: I was about to send a gift to a friend and at the same time he sent me one as well but didnt appear on the screen. I searched my champions one by one for an hour and again didnt find it ... is there any way i can find which one it is? im not sure if he actually sent me a gift but i heard the sound effect it does

replies.body: I agree with Zombiemaster's information, and hope it helped!  If you still have any concerns, please reach out to our [Player Support Team ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)who can give you some more specifics.

If you go to the store, there's an icon in the top right next to the gift icon that has a persons head and a gear (it will say "Account" if you hover over it). Click on that icon and it will bring you to the store's account options, and to the left there will be 3 categories. Click on "Purchase History," and then a little further down there should be a "Gifting History" option. If you click on that, it will show you all of the gifts that you have given and received within a certain time frame.

Hopefully this helps.
